body:
If any of you made a game, what would you do?
So the topic i have chosen is racing.
What you have to do
Answer what you would do.
And what you would add to the game

I will start it off.
There are not only cars. There are motor bikes, monster trucks, quads and buggy's.
What would u add?
Thanks, Endertait.

title: What if you invented a game?

replies.body: All the best cars. I would add lots of paths and nitrous boosts!
replies.body_tagged: All the best cars. I would add lots of paths and nitrous boosts!

replies.body: Ok ill continue, guns strapped to the sides of the cars :D
replies.body_tagged: Ok ill continue, guns strapped to the sides of the cars :D

replies.body: the cars are driven by unicorns who change colors and have magical AK47s that shoot kycraffts
replies.body_tagged: the cars are driven by unicorns who change colors and have magical AK47s that shoot kycraffts

replies.body: More Twisted Metal would be nice. :P A demolition derby game.
replies.body_tagged: More Twisted Metal would be nice. :P A demolition derby game.

replies.body: Ok ill continue, realistic physics. So breaking drive shafts, but respawnable cars.
replies.body_tagged: Ok ill continue, realistic physics. So breaking drive shafts, but respawnable cars.
